txt.en: Fortifications can be found around the gate at Helm's Dike.\n\nYou should examine the various fortifications of the Rohirrim.
Tell Gimli your observations of the fortifications at Helm's Gate
<rgb=#FF0000>(This quest must be finished before Th√©oden's company departs)</rgb>

'Well? What do you think, [placeholder]?'

You quietly relay your observations to Gimli.

'I could not have said it better myself. There is good, strong rock here, but it is not enough. I fear for these men, doughty though they are.

'Tonight I expect to make a great stand at the Hornburg, and if it is my last battle, I will take many an Uruk with me!'
Gimli stands at Helm's Gate in the southern Westfold.\n\nYou should speak with Gimli.
This fortification is strong, but it will not keep out a great host of fierce Uruk-hai ([placeholder]/[placeholder])
Gimli is interested in the stability of the fortifications at Helm's Gate, and wishes to hear your opinion.
The gate is well-kept and hardy, but could easily be crushed by enemy siege-craft

'It is good to see you again, [placeholder]! I know that you have acquired some expertise in your travels. Tell me: what do you think of these fortifications?

'The Rohirrim claim that none can break the wall, and the Hornburg will be the safest place in all of Rohan. I have my own thoughts on the matter.

'Will you have a look around and tell me what you think?'
